channel.title: I can't connect to my friends server
channel.description: my friend got the messycape source and client. I got them both as well... he portforward the port, and i still cant seem to connect to his server... if any one can help that would be GREAT!

item.title: I can't connect to my friends server
item.dc:creator: @rawr-scape rawr-scape
item.description:
@rawr-scape wrote:

He isn’t portforwarding correctly, that is the only reason.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't connect to my friends server

item.title: I can't connect to my friends server
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

If the server is online and you’ve typed in his server IP correctly and it doesn’t work, then he didn’t port forward correctly.

Read full topic
